global_notes: Surface baseline groups G1 and G2 match results exactly. No reassignment needed. G1: self-interest belief effect on targeted tax acceptance (IV). G2: environmental effectiveness belief effect on initial tax approval (IV). Both groups use manual 2SLS with survey weights. G2 has two baselines with different outcome codings (Yes vs NotNo).

baseline_groups.claim_summary: LATE/IV: Effect of self-interest belief (not losing from carbon tax+dividend) on targeted carbon tax acceptance, instrumented by random dividend eligibility. French survey RCT.
baseline_groups.notes: run_001 = Table 5.2 Col 1 (subsample p10-p60), run_002 = Table 5.2 Col 2 (full sample). Both measure acceptance of targeted tax+dividend (not opposed). Treatment: endogenous_non_perdant instrumented by traite_cible assignment.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: LATE/IV: Effect of environmental effectiveness belief on initial carbon tax approval, instrumented by random information treatment. French survey RCT.
baseline_groups.notes: run_014 = Table 5.4 Col 1 (Yes/Yes coding), run_015 = Table 5.4 Col 3 (NotNo/Yes coding). Treatment: endogenous_eff_yes instrumented by info treatments. Two baselines with different outcome binary codings.
